00002 #define ROTATION3DMATRIX_H

00004 #include "matrix.h"
00005 #include <math.h>

00007 class
00008 Rotation3DMatrix : public Matrix< double > {
00009 public:
00010         Rotation3DMatrix( double xCorner, double yCorner, double zCorner ) : Matrix< double >( 3 ) {
00011                 (*this)[ 0 ][ 0 ] = cos( zCorner ) * cos( yCorner );
00012                 (*this)[ 0 ][ 1 ] = sin( zCorner ) * cos( yCorner );
00013                 (*this)[ 0 ][ 2 ] = -sin( yCorner );
00014                 (*this)[ 1 ][ 0 ] = ( sin( xCorner ) * sin( yCorner ) * cos( zCorner ) ) - ( cos( xCorner ) * sin( zCorner ) );
00015                 (*this)[ 1 ][ 1 ] = ( sin( xCorner ) * sin( yCorner ) * sin( zCorner ) ) + ( cos( xCorner ) * cos( zCorner ) );
00016                 (*this)[ 1 ][ 2 ] = sin( xCorner ) * cos( yCorner );
00017                 (*this)[ 2 ][ 0 ] = ( cos( xCorner ) * sin( yCorner ) * cos( zCorner ) ) + ( sin( xCorner ) * sin( zCorner ) );
00018                 (*this)[ 2 ][ 1 ] = ( cos( xCorner ) * sin( yCorner ) * sin( zCorner ) ) - ( sin( xCorner ) * cos( zCorner ) );
00019                 (*this)[ 2 ][ 2 ] = cos( xCorner ) * cos( yCorner );
00020         }
00021 };

00023 #endif
